amendatorysection.para: Veterinary medicine and surgery includes veterinary surgery, obstetrics, dentistry, and all other branches or specialties of veterinary medicine.

annotation.para: Given its ordinary meaning, dentistry, as used in this section, includes procedures performed in an animal's mouth. State ex rel. Dept. of Health v. Jeffrey, 247 Neb. 100, 525 N.W.2d 193 (1994).
